mapper.update:
update lsd_renewal_detail
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_plan_repayment = #{gmtPlanRepayment,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
renewal_amount = #{renewalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prior_interest = #{priorInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prior_overdue = #{priorOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
capital = #{capital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
current_poundage = #{currentPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rebate_amount = #{rebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
card_name = #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_number = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_trade_no = #{payTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
renewal_day = #{renewalDay,jdbcType=TINYINT},
poundage_rate = #{poundageRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
base_bank_rate = #{baseBankRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fail_reason = #{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update lsd_renewal_detail set is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, borrow_id = #{borrowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_plan_repayment = #{gmtPlanRepayment,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, renewal_amount = #{renewalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prior_interest = #{priorInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, prior_overdue = #{priorOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, capital = #{capital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, current_poundage = #{currentPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rebate_amount = #{rebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actual_amount = #{actualAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, card_name = #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_number = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_trade_no = #{payTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, renewal_day = #{renewalDay,jdbcType=TINYINT}, poundage_rate = #{poundageRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, base_bank_rate = #{baseBankRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fail_reason = #{failReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.*,t1.borrow_no from lsd_renewal_detail t,lsd_borrow_cash t1 where t.gmt_create >= #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.gmt_create <= #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.borrow_id = t1.id
